title: I am probably blind, but where did region transfer go?
body:
TL:DR Where is the account region transfer section in shop, not even in the account section?

I'm going to be taking a trip to a region outside of NA and I want to transfer my account to this region, but in the shop, I just can't find the region transfer section. I'm pretty sure it used to be in the account section, but the only things I see are "Purchase History", "Redeem Codes", "RP Purchase History" and "Gifting History". If anyone knows where it is, please let me know.

Thanks for reading if you made it this far.

replies.body:
Transferring is not available in the Alpha/Beta client, but if you launch into the Legacy Client, you'll see the option there.

Let me know if you have any questions.
